website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful and ample vessel sink inspired by European design.
pros: Good quality at a reasonable price
Mid-range size is perfect for many consumers
cons: Sink is thinner than some other choices and therefore may not be as durable over the long haul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful. I have a small bathroom. I had to make the cabinet and counter top to maximize space and they don't make stock cabinets and counter tops for what I needed. I also needed a smaller sink. The ones I was finding in the store were a bit large; 15 x 15. I went on line and found this. Not only was the price right, but it really exceeded my expectations when it arrived. I had no problem installing the sink. It all came together and really makes the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Bowl is 12.5" diameter porcelain
customer_reviews.text: Note bowl is 12.5" diameter, not 13. Nice smooth porcelain finish, lip of bowl is a little thinner than expected, but should be durable enough. Drain hole easily fits standard pop-up assy. Flat base sits directly on counter, but needs minor sanding to remove glaze splatters & debris before installing.
customer_reviews.author: April Scoles

customer_reviews.title: Totally lopsided sink. Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally lopsided sink This sink is not fit to be sold! It rocked back and forth on the vanity because the bottom was so uneven. The rim was also misshapen. The sink was lightweight and very flimsy around the edges. Buy the Kraus sink. It is perfect , sturdy and a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: caitallie

customer_reviews.title: Quality and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Thick and heavy. Great price with no sacrifice!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Polk

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: It's good, nothing wrong with the product. But, I thought it was a bit small when I received it. When I wash my face or hands it gets on the counter because the bowl is so narrow. I wish I would've gone with a wider bowl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small space, easy to clean, and easy to install. The decent sized flat bottom gives you a good amount of surface to adhere to the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzi Mars

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty sink sits level on counter haven't installed yet will update with pictures when installed
customer_reviews.author: Lori McCord

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: I love my sink bowls! My only complaint about them is that the rim isn’t perfectly flush round like it should be. I only noticed upon installation but I positioned them where it is not as noticeable. I try not to look at them from any other angle than the top to avoid an ocd trigger
customer_reviews.author: Crystal ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sink!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape, very nice sink and highly reccomend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony W

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bowl for a small pedestal sink for a hall bath. Perfect for all you DIYers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Basic White But Nice
customer_reviews.text: Look great on the antique sideboard we turned into a bathroom vanity! Came quickly and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: CJane33

customer_reviews.title: Round Bowl Above Sink Basin
customer_reviews.text: It’s the size and shape I need. Would like it better if the color is exactly as pretty as the product picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Mingwei Li
